Html: I'm looking for a citations style for a fulltext footnotes with bibliography index. I tried the MHRA which come close to what i'm looking for but it only works fine for the citation for the footnote like e.g. "Publisher, Book (City: Year)" etc. but the automatic bibliography index always show "Unsupported source type (Book) for source" for each citation. All other styles i tried are always formatted in brackets and ids. Does anyone has an alternative style? I'm using Microsoft Word 2014 on Windows and Word 2011 on Mac. Thanks!
